description: Sexy Latino realtor Guy Lima is trying to convince young hotshot property-flipper Todd to buy a nice-looking duplex. He shaves 60k off the asking price, but that still isn’t enough. Todd makes him a counter-offer, take 70k off and give up that ass. Like a true man-whore, Guy accepts the deal and soon has big white cock clogging his throat. Todd drills his tight ass like crazy then covers the desperate little slut in a huge facial cumshot.
title: Property POV - Guy Lima - Drop The Price and Your Pants
